title: Critical Companion Learning Design for Integrating Palliative Care in Nursing Homes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing, geriatric care knowledge, and palliative care concepts
context.additional_context: Educational course conducted in smartphone-based limited technology environments, providing continuous feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the necessity of integrating palliative care in nursing home settings based on three or more real-world case studies.
Learners can resolve issues arising during collaborative processes with peers using a two-stage or higher analytical framework based on the critical companion model.
Learners can develop and evaluate an implementation plan for integrating palliative care in nursing homes through a 10-month phased approach (plan-do-reflect).

resources: Google Form template for weekly reflective journaling
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
